title: QuantumRPG应用问题
author: 我素提米
txt_content: 如题，如何设置QuantumRPG（DivineItemsRPG后续版本）的装备防御力

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content: /qrpg set armortype <type> <amount> [line] - Set the type of armor to item.

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
种类：
[size=14.6667px]There are 6 armor types by default:
[size=14.6667px]Physical
[size=14.6667px]Magical
[size=14.6667px]Poison
[size=14.6667px]Fire
[size=14.6667px]Water
[size=14.6667px]Wind
